text: Calvin Berle Swenson (April 16, 1948 â€“ January 1, 2014) was a Canadian professional ice hockey forward. Swenson was born in Watson, Saskatchewan. He played 102 games in the World Hockey Association with the Winnipeg Jets. He died suddenly on January 1, 2014, aged 65. ==Awards and achievements== *MJHL First All-Star Team (1967) *In 1970, he scored the fastest hat trick in the Central Hockey League's history, in 1 minute, 44 seconds. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1948 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Brandon Wheat Kings players Category:Canadian ice hockey forwards Category:Flin Flon Bombers players Category:Ice hockey people from Saskatchewan Category:World Hockey Association players
title: Cal Swenson
